name: Small Health Potion
description: Restores a small amount of health.

name: Medium Health Potion
description: Restores a moderate amount of health.

name: Large Health Potion
description: Restores a large amount of health.

name: Elixir of Life
description: Fully restores health.

name: Mega Health Potion
description: Restores a massive amount of health.

name: Ultimate Health Potion
description: Maximizes the player's health.

name: Mystic Elixir
description: Heals all wounds and grants extra health.

name: Minor Healing Brew
description: A basic potion that restores health slightly.

name: Greater Healing Potion
description: Restores a significant amount of health.

name: Potion of Vitality
description: Increases overall vitality, restoring a lot of health.

name: Life Essence
description: A rare potion that fully revitalizes the user.

name: Small Aura Potion
description: Increases aura by a small amount.

name: Medium Aura Potion
description: Increases aura by a moderate amount.

name: Large Aura Potion
description: Increases aura by a large amount.

name: Grand Aura Elixir
description: Greatly enhances aura for a short period.

name: Mystic Aura Potion
description: Boosts aura to its maximum capacity.

name: Potion of Spiritual Energy
description: Refills aura with a mystical boost.

name: Elixir of the Ancients
description: Infuses the user with ancient aura energy.

name: Arcane Aura Elixir
description: Increases aura to near limitless levels.

name: Divine Aura Potion
description: Grants divine aura power for a short time.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword.

name: Silver Dagger
description: A sharp dagger made of silver.

name: Fire Staff
description: A staff imbued with the power of fire.

name: Lightning Bow
description: A bow that shoots electrified arrows.

name: Ice Wand
description: A wand that casts freezing spells.

name: Shadow Blade
description: A blade that strikes with the power of shadows.

name: Thunder Hammer
description: A hammer that calls down thunder upon impact.

name: Poisoned Dagger
description: A dagger coated with a deadly poison.

name: War Axe
description: A heavy axe designed for battle.

name: Holy Sword
description: A sword blessed with divine power.

name: Plasma Rifle
description: A futuristic weapon that shoots plasma bolts.

name: Dragon Slayer
description: A legendary sword designed to defeat dragons.

name: Vampire Fang
description: A weapon imbued with vampire essence.

name: Phoenix Feather Bow
description: A bow made with feathers of the Phoenix, capable of shooting fiery arrows.

name: Doomhammer
description: A mythical hammer that brings destruction upon its target.
